MaxMind Geolocation DXL Python Client Library

This distribution contains following directories:

  • doc
    • MaxMind Geolocation DXL Python Client library documentation
  • lib
    • MaxMind Geolocation DXL Python Client libraries (.zip, .egg, .whl)
  • sample
    • Samples that demonstrate using the MaxMind Geolocation DXL Python Client library

Click here to view the documentation which includes installation instructions and usage examples.
